content:
TASK: Craft an item of type: pink_stained_glass

thought: To craft a pink_stained_glass, I need to craft a pink dye which requires a red dye. Therefore, I will first move the red_tulip from slot 42 into the crafting grid at slot 1.
Ok
act: move from slot 42 to slot 1 with quantity 1
